title: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
headline: This Month's GTA+ Benefits
subtitle: GTA+
content:
In addition to the recurring monthly GTA$500,000 deposited directly into your Maze Bank account, GTA+ members who've signed up for this month (April 4 - May 1) will also receive:

— An extra bonus of GTA$1,000,000 every month
— The Progen Itali GTB
— Exclusive clothing
— Biker discounts and bonuses
— Boosted business Production Speeds
— And more

Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
